mapper.sql: id, fullname, appellation, owner, company, job, email, phone, website, mphone, state, source, create_by, create_time, edit_by, edit_time, description, contact_summary, next_contact_time, address
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_clue(id, fullname, appellation, owner, company, job, email, phone, website, mphone, state,source, create_by, create_time, description, contact_summary,next_contact_time, address) values (#{id},#{fullname},#{appellation},#{owner},#{company},#{job},#{email},#{phone},#{website},#{mphone},#{state},#{source}, #{create_by}, #{create_time}, #{description},#{contact_summary},#{next_contact_time}, #{address})
mapper.select:
select a1.id, a1.fullname,d1.value as appellation,u1.name as owner,a1.company,a1.job,a1.email,a1.phone,a1.website,a1.mphone,d2.value as state, d3.value as source,u2.name as create_by,a1.create_time,u3.name as edit_by,a1.edit_time,a1.description,a1.contact_summary, a1.next_contact_time,a1.address from tbl_clue a1 join tbl_user u1 on a1.owner=u1.id join tbl_user u2 on a1.create_by=u2.id left join tbl_user u3 on a1.edit_by=u3.id join tbl_dic_value d1 on a1.appellation=d1.id join tbl_dic_value d2 on a1.state=d2.id join tbl_dic_value d3 on a1.source=d3.id
and a1.fullname like '%' #{fullname} '%'
and u1.name like '%' #{owner} '%'
and a1.company like '%' #{company} '%'
and a1.phone like '%' #{phone} '%'
and a1.source like '%' #{source} '%'
and a1.mphone like '%' #{mphone} '%'
and a1.state like '%' #{state} '%'
limit #{start_flg},#{pageflg}

select a1.id, a1.fullname,d1.value as appellation,u1.name as owner,a1.company,a1.job,a1.email,a1.phone,a1.website,a1.mphone,d2.value as state, d3.value as source,u2.name as create_by,a1.create_time,u3.name as edit_by,a1.edit_time,a1.description,a1.contact_summary, a1.next_contact_time,a1.address from tbl_clue a1 join tbl_user u1 on a1.owner=u1.id join tbl_user u2 on a1.create_by=u2.id left join tbl_user u3 on a1.edit_by=u3.id left join tbl_dic_value d1 on a1.appellation=d1.id left join tbl_dic_value d2 on a1.state=d2.id left join tbl_dic_value d3 on a1.source=d3.id where a1.id=#{id}

select count(*) from tbl_clue a1 join tbl_user u1 on a1.owner=u1.id join tbl_user u2 on a1.create_by=u2.id left join tbl_user u3 on a1.edit_by=u3.id join tbl_dic_value d1 on a1.appellation=d1.id join tbl_dic_value d2 on a1.state=d2.id join tbl_dic_value d3 on a1.source=d3.id
and a1.fullname like '%' #{fullname} '%'
and u1.name like '%' #{owner} '%'
and a1.company like '%' #{company} '%'
and a1.phone like '%' #{phone} '%'
and a1.source like '%' #{source} '%'
and a1.mphone like '%' #{mphone} '%'
and a1.state like '%' #{state} '%'

select
distinct
from tbl_clue
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
VALUES IDENTITY_VAL_LOCAL()
insert into tbl_clue (fullname, appellation, owner, company, job, email, phone, website, mphone, state, source, create_by, create_time, edit_by, edit_time, description, contact_summary, next_contact_time, address) values (#{fullname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appellation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{owner,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{job,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{website,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{create_by,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{create_time,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{edit_by,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{edit_time,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contact_summary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{next_contact_time,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
